# DatePickerStyle.Configuration

**Type Alias**

A type alias for the properties of a `DatePicker`.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Configuration = DatePickerStyleConfiguration
```

## Creating custom date picker styles

- **makeBody(configuration:)**: Returns the appearance and interaction content for a `DatePicker`.
- **DatePickerStyleConfiguration**: The properties of a `DatePicker`.
- **Body**: A view representing the appearance and interaction of a `DatePicker`.

items.description: Returns the appearance and interaction content for a `DatePicker`.
items.name: makeBody(configuration:)

items.name: Body
